programme.desc: The No. 1 seed Wolfpack battle the No. 3 Blue Devils in the ACC Tournament final. NC State seeks its fourth title in the last six years after ousting North Carolina 66-55 in the semifinals. Duke, which last won in 2013, dispatched Notre Dame 61-56.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Blue Devils (4-0) and Tar Heels (3-1) play for the Victory Bell in an ACC opener. North Carolina has won five in a row over Duke after a 47-45 double-overtime thriller in 2023. UNC dropped another shootout in Week 4, 70-50 versus James Madison.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Cardinals try to solve the ACC foe Wolfpack. NC State has claimed four straight meetings to even the series at 14. Louisville has won 12 of its last 13 games. Cardinals senior Chucky Hepburn averages 15 points and 6.2 assists per outing.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 19 Cardinals (22-6, 15-2) roll into their ACC affair with the Panthers (16-12, 7-10). Louisville has won six straight and 16 of its last 17 games, including an 82-78 triumph over Pittsburgh on Jan. 11 behind seven 3-pointers from Reyne Smith.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Sun Devils play their first Big 12 game as they visit the Cougars. The schools met in the 2023 Vegas Showdown, with BYU pummeling Arizona State 77-49. Malian senior Fousseyni Traore (BYU) had six points, nine rebounds and five assists in the win.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Big 12 action brings the Bearcats (12-6, 2-5) to the Rockies for a match with the Cougars (12-6, 3-4). Cincinnati scored a 71-60 victory over BYU last season. Cougars scoring leader Richie Saunders totaled 79 points over his last four contests.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Bears roam into the Marriott Center for a match with the Cougars. Baylor has won its past two after beating Utah on Jan. 25. Norchad Omier recorded his ninth double-double of the season in that win. Baylor is 2-4 in true road games in 2024-25.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 23 Jayhawks (17-8, 8-6 Big 12) try to salvage their Beehive State trip when they face the Cougars (17-8, 8-6). Kansas fell to Utah 74-67 on Feb. 15. Dallin Hall scored 18 points to lead BYU past Kansas at Allen Fieldhouse 76-68 last season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Coming off a historic win, the Cougars (18-8, 9-6 Big 12) visit the No. 19 Wildcats (18-8, 12-3). BYU handed No. 23 Kansas one of the most lopsided losses of Bill Self's tenure by dismantling the Jayhawks 91-57 on Feb. 18. Arizona is 11-2 at home.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 15 Bulldogs host the in-state rival No. 21 Rebels. Mississippi State has lost two in a row to top-10 Kentucky and No. 1 Auburn. Ole Miss toppled No. 4 Alabama for a fourth straight win Jan. 14. The Bulldogs won four of the last five meetings.
